text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, amvoli jakdigarro ʙa ʙotil [va az rohhoi nomasru'e hamcun ƣasʙu duzdi va risva] naxured, magar in ki ticorate ʙo rizoijati sumo [ancom girifta] ʙosad; va [hamcunin] jakdigarro nakused va xudkusi nakuned; hamono Alloh taolo [nisʙat] ʙa sumo mehruʙon ast [va sumoro az in korho ʙoz medorad]
